schema.title: Module name
schema.description: Module name used to generate Android Studio files and class names. CamelCase e.g. 'MyNewModule'

schema.title: Module ID
schema.description: Module id used as package for the new module. FQDN e.g. 'com.example.module'

validators.message: Module ID must be a fully qualified domain name

schema.title: owner
schema.description: The owner name used to identify the owner of this component

validators.message: Owner names must consist only of lowercase letters
